name: Holographic City Manager: Easy Money
description:
I would love to hear what you think of the game! Please join our Discord server and leave a tiny review Click here
~~~~

Holographic City Manager: Easy money

Will your city touch the sky before you are crushed under crippling debt?

  • Live your dream as an owner of virtual land!
  • Take out in-game real loans to make your in-game virtual city flourish and turn virtual land virtual taxes into in-game real cash.
  • Spend your in-game real cash on virtual land virtual products!

..and profit?
